description: Contents: Shir la-ḥatunat Yitsḥaḳ ben Shabtai Marini (Poem for the wedding of Isaac Marini) (ff. 1r-10r). Commentary on Tractate Rosh ha-Shanah (ff. 11r-25v). ʿAśarah pirḳe Mishnah (ff. 26r-50r). ʿEśrim ṿe-arbaʿah ḳushṭe kalah (ff. 50v-52v). Kaṿanat le-tefilot ʿerev shabat (ff. 53r-54v).
title: Poem for the wedding of Isaac Marini and other works
author: Luzzatto, Moshe Ḥayyim
